verses.verse: How<WH4100> have you helped<WH5826> him that is without<WH3808> power?<WH3581> how save<WH3467> you the arm<WH2220> that has no<WH3808> strength?<WH5797>
How<WH4100> have you counceled<WH3289> him that has no<WH3808> wisdom?<WH2451> and how have you plentifully<WH7230> declared<WH3045> the thing as it is?
To whom<WH4310> have you uttered<WH5046> words?<WH4405> and whose<WH4310> spirit<WH5397> came<WH3318> from you?
Dead<WH7496> things are formed<WH2342> from under<WH8478> the waters,<WH4325> and the inhabitants<WH7934> thereof.
Hell<WH7585> is naked<WH6174> before<WH5048> him, and destruction<WH11> has no<WH369> covering.<WH3682>
He stretches<WH5186> out the north<WH6828> over<WH5921> the empty<WH8414> place,<WH8414> and hangs<WH8518> the earth<WH776> on nothing.<WH1099>
He binds<WH6887> up the waters<WH4325> in his thick clouds;<WH5645> and the cloud<WH6051> is not rent<WH1234> under<WH5921> them.
He holds<WH270> back the face<WH6440> of his throne,<WH3678> and spreads<WH6576> his cloud<WH6051> on it.
He has compassed<WH2328> the waters<WH4325> with bounds,<WH2706> until<WH5704> the day<WH216> and night<WH2822> come to an end.<WH8503>
The pillars<WH5982> of heaven<WH8064> tremble<WH7322> and are astonished<WH8539> at his reproof.<WH1606>
He divides<WH7280> the sea<WH3220> with his power,<WH3581> and by his understanding<WH8394> he smites<WH4272> through the proud.<WH7293>
By his spirit<WH7307> he has garnished<WH8235> the heavens;<WH8064> his hand<WH3027> has formed<WH2342> the crooked<WH1281> serpent.<WH5175>

See,<WH2005> these<WH428> are parts<WH7098> of his ways:<WH1870> but how<WH4100> little<WH8102> a portion<WH1697> is heard<WH8085> of him? but the thunder<WH7482> of his power<WH1369> who<WH4310> can understand?<WH995>
